import sys
lines = sys.stdin.readlines()
T = int(lines[0].strip())
# (N, K) = map(int, lines[0].strip().split(" "))
for t in range(T):
    (a, b, n, m) = map(int, lines[t+1].strip().split(" "))
    res = True
    if n + m > a + b: res = False
    elif m > min(a, b): res = False
    if res: print("Yes")
    else: print("No")
